import { Card, Row, Col, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import '../App.css' import Image from 'react-bootstrap/Image' import { AiFillStar, AiOutlineHeart } from 'react-icons/ai'; import axios from 'axios'; import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; const ShowProduct = () => { const [product, setProduct] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { GetProduct() }, []) const GetProduct = async () => { axios.get("/product/getbyid/" + "61d581961bd9d464dcf721ff") .then(res => setProduct(res.data)) } return (
Product name {product.product_name}
Product Type {product.product_type}
Product Price {product.product_price}
Product Amount {product.product_amount}
Product Sold Amount {product.product_sold_amount}
Product Seller {product.seller}
Product Options {product.product_option}
Product Desciption {product.product_description}
) } const imageStyle = { width: 450, } const buttonTypeStyle = { marginRight: 20 } const hrStyle = { marginTop: 20, marginBottom: 20 } const spanStyleLeft = { paddingLeft: 30, fontWeight: 500 } const spanStyleRight = { paddingLeft: 20, fontWeight: 500 } export default ShowProduct
